Is not this a true declaration of God? We must take it as such. We may not understand how it can all be, and theologians may try to explain it, but we 
                                                                           283
can see it no better and can do no better than to believe God is true. He says it and it must be so. Take the gracious gift in the promises of God, believe all the Scripture tells us, although you cannot explain it and no one can explain it to you. Herein is faith put to the stretch. Christ died for the ungodly.
